protocol_start: 2–3x/week full-body; 6–8 movements (push, pull, hinge, squat, carry); 2–3 sets each at RPE 6–7; 60–120 s rest.
progression_rule: If HRV >= baseline and sleep >=6.5h, progress load/duration by 5–10% weekly; else hold/deload.
contraindications_flags: Avoid HIIT/heavy loads if SBP>=160, DBP>=100, illness, dizziness, or glucose>250.
safety_notes: Stop if chest pain, dyspnea, dizziness, or near-fall.
coach_script_non_api: Today: complete planned session at RPE 6–7. If HRV low or sleep poor, reduce intensity/volume.
coach_prompt_api: You are a brain-health exercise coach. Provide plan, rationale, progression, safety. Avoid diagnosis.

protocol_start: 1–2x/week; low-impact drills (step jumps to low box, line hops, pogo hops). 3–4 sets of 6–10 contacts; 60–120 s rest; RPE 5–6; thorough warm-up.
progression_rule: Increase task difficulty, then add light weights; RPE≤6–7
contraindications_flags: Avoid heavy loads if SBP>=160, DBP>=100, illness, dizziness, or glucose>250.
safety_notes: Emphasize low-impact drills and soft, quiet landings; thorough warm-up; clear area; supportive shoes; hand support nearby for beginners; abort on dizziness, near-fall, or joint pain; avoid if blood pressure is uncontrolled (e.g., SBP ≥160 mmHg).
coach_script_non_api: Today: 3 sets of 8 line hops (both feet) at RPE 5–6; rest 60–90 s; focus on soft landings. If HRV is below baseline or sleep efficiency <85%, reduce to 2×6 and substitute fast step-ups. Progress by +2 contacts next session if joints feel good and balance steady.
coach_prompt_api: You are a brain-health exercise coach. Create a concise, low-impact plyometric session (speed/executive focus) with: (1) the plan (sets/contacts/rest, RPE 5–6), (2) why it supports cognition (processing speed/executive via fast-twitch recruitment and cortical plasticity), (3) a safe progression for next week, and (4) explicit safety checks (land softly, clear area, no uncontrolled BP, stop on dizziness/near-fall). Avoid diagnosis. Prefer substitutions (fast step-ups) if HRV is low, sleep is poor, or SBP ≥160.
